name: GenereteRequestURL
func:
var temperature = msg.payload.temperature
var humidity = msg.payload.humidity
var light = msg.payload.light
var url = "https://api.thingspeak.com/update?api_key=F1AGZDQ65MB8IU70&field1="+temperature+"&field2="+humidity+"&field3="+light
return {url: url}

name: FormatToCSV
